title: Filled by the Headless Horseman
description: The Sleepy Hollow fairy tale gets a gender bending twist when Isabell Crane gets shunned by Mikeal Van Tassel - the love of her life - and encounters the legendary Headless Horseman, and his legendary sexual appetite, in a moment that will changer her life forever.  ***WARNING*** THIS STORY HAS EXPLICIT, HARDCORE SEX. Those looking for a tame fairy tale romance erotica should avoid buying my book.  ***All characters in this book are of adult, consenting age. There is no snuff, underage, or non-consenting sex in this book.***
author: Tallia Ravejoy
